items.sentence: The more skills one masters, the greater contribution one can make to society.
No sooner had she caught sight of me than she started running in my direction.
Because her parents got divorced, the girl had little contact with her father.
Tom was a very good banjo player before he had three of his fingers amputated.
Tom couldn't afford to buy the computer he wanted, so he bought a cheaper one.
The people next door were annoyed with us for making so much noise last night.
Tom looked just like the guy in the picture that the police officer showed us.
We have new data about production and sale of electric fly swatters worldwide.
There's nothing wrong with staying silent when you don't have anything to say.
It's always difficult for a son to live up to the expectations of his parents.
